REGISTRATION_COURSE_LEVEL_NOT_FOUND: Course level not found in registration.
REGISTRATION_COURSE_LEVEL_ALREADY_EXISTS: Course level already exists in registration.
NO_COURSES_REGISTERED: You haven't registered for any courses.
COURSES_NOT_EXIST: One or more selected courses do not exist.
CREDIT_HOURS_EXCEED_MAX: Total credit hours ({total}) exceeds the maximum allowed ({max}).
CREDIT_HOURS_BELOW_MIN: Total credit hours ({total}) is less than the minimum required ({min}).
PREREQUISITE_NOT_MET: One or more selected courses do not meet prerequisite requirements.
RETAKE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Retake limit exceeded. You have retaken {previous} courses (max: {max}). You are attempting to retake {selected} courses, but only {available} slots are available.
REGISTRATION_COURSE_IDS_ARRAY: Course IDs must be an array.
REGISTRATION_COURSE_IDS_UUID: Each course ID must be a valid UUID.
REGISTRATION_STATUS_IS_OPEN_BOOLEAN: isOpen must be a boolean value.
